page.title: 06THE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Enderby Leisure Centre is used by many people in the area.The building is very smart and has not long been finished.There are facilities for playing badminton,squash,table tennis, snooker,volleyball,basketball and indoor football.There is a sauna and solarium. The centre has a 25m swimming pool.The swimming pool is L shaped. In the deep end it is 1.8m,in the shallow end it is 45cm.We use the pool every Wednesday for school swimming lessons,and on Sunday I go for extra lessons. On Thursday afternoon I go to the badminton club where we practise our shots and play each other for an hour.This costs 70p a session.
